TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GeometryHitTestResult extends System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult

summary.span: 返回命中测试的结果，该测试使用 作为命中测试参数。

span.span: Returns the results of a hit test that uses a as a hit test parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以通过命中的测试的视觉对象上使用作为命中测试参数，并返回结果作为。You can also perform a hit test on a visual object by using a as a hit test parameter, and return the result as a .

summary.span: 获取命中测试的 值。

span.span: Gets the value of the hit test.
The value of the hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性描述之间的交集和目标视觉对象。The property describes the intersection between a and the target visual object. 下图显示的命中的测试几何图形 （蓝色圆圈） 和目标对象 （红色方框） 之间的关系。The following illustration shows the relationship between the hit test geometry (the blue circle) and the target object (the red square). ![命中测试中使用的 IntersectionDetail 的示意图](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "关系图的 IntersectionDetail 中使用命中测试")![Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing") 命中的测试几何图形和目标对象之间的交集The intersection between a hit test geometry and a target object ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性。The following example shows how to use the property of . [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/GeometryHitTest.cs#hittestingoverviewsnippet11)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/geometryhittest.vb#hittestingoverviewsnippet11)]
